about_the_game:
Feel the Neon Universe in your bones!


Would you like to experience your favorite music genres in a new way? No need to worry, BandRoll VR creates amazing universes for you, blended with music genres. You can enjoy playing games while listening to your favorite music.

Different Challenges


Move on the platforms at the right time to complete the levels and earn more points. Different levels with different speeds will keep you hooked. If you're not satisfied with the easy or normal difficulties, try the hard levels. I'm sure you won't finish it in one go :)

Fun VR Mechanics...


There are two different control options you can choose from to play BandRoll VR:

Swipe
Recommended for "Easy" and "Normal" difficulty levels, this option allows you to guide the ball by sliding the VR controller in the direction you want to go.

Touchpad
Recommended for "Hard" and "Insane" difficulty levels, you can guide the ball using the Touchpad on the VR controller.

Competition


See how your total points earned rank among all players. If you're not among the best, there's no need to get down. Try to get a better score by replaying the levels you've already played. Of course, if you haven't played all the levels, finish them first and get closer to your maximum limit.

Different Balls


As you finish levels, you'll gain energy to unlock and play with different types of balls.

Such a Universe for Such Music!


Experience completely different neon universes with the dynamic universe system that changes according to different music genres!

  • Electronic
  • Rock
  • Metal
  • Classic
